Description: * Various adjustments to {{PageRef|Soul Orb|alt_name=orb}} spawning behavior (a bit less horizontal motion and some more variance and details to its motion)
* New categories added to builds are now wider by default
* Added a console command: deadlock_get_old_builds, which will download and print out all of the build data for your account prior to the new builds feature
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Added a directional arrow particle effect to {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} for {{PageRef|Viscous}}
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Added additional particles while using {{PageRef|Goo Ball}}
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Fixed hit detection on {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} and {{PageRef|Goo Ball}}
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} having 2x the range of the tooltip.
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} being able to target behind puddle
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} using {{PageRef|Guardian}}s as a surface to punch from
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Splatter}} now deals less damage if it hits the same target multiple times. 66% damage for the second hit, 33% damage for the third hit.
